channel.title: New
channel.description:
Was wondering how you would...Well, copy a current area of the runescape map and paste it somewhere else. Like...Copy lumbridge...And paste it at coordinates 4000 4000. I was told to edit the mapdata, but I am not aware of how to do this, help please?
Also looking to just be able to create completely new areas. Now...I've seen many people do this, yet no one seems to care enough to help.
Keep searching for something like it and cannot find anything.

item.title: New
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

[quote=“dillingo, post:4, topic:289921”][quote author=Setsuna link=topic=383251.msg2877576#msg2877576 date=1248135752]

why wuld u…?

I cannot use the current rs areas. If you do not know how, then please do not post…
[/quote]
He was just asking a question, and you already posted this in client help. So stop double posting.[/quote]

Dillingo, I have been told off many times for not posting on-topic comments. I don’t see why Silab Garza should be allowed to. Anyway, I don’t know how, I’m sure it would be Mapdata, but I am unsure how. Sorry for spamming your thread, too.

Read full topic

item.title: New
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

`Rich:

not server related.

Oh? Well, I figured there would be a way to copy an area server sided. Whatever.

Read full topic
